wikipedia_page.main: Charles Frederick Dobson (9 September 1862 – 18 May 1939), known as "Charley Dobson", was an English international footballer, who played as a half back.

response: His brother Charles Dobson was also a footballer.

link_mentions.page: Responsibility for the burning of Smyrna
response: Charles Dobson, an Anglican chaplain in Smyrna, was convinced that the Turks started the fire. He wrote multiple reports stating this belief in response to Turkish denial of responsibility.
